name: CelebrateHanukkah
0:
”Alexa celebrate Hanukkah”
”Alexa, open celebrate Hanukkah”
”Alexa, start celebrate Hanukkah”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: celebrate hanukkah
des: Chag Sameach! Every day, Alexa will guide you through a little background about Hanukkah and the wonderful miracle that we are celebrating! Then, hear the blessing for each evening. You can also use Alexa to say the blessings for the challah and wine!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
